alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 10:30PM CST until February 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR WESTERN BENTON...SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 1030 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Gravette to Springtown to 2 miles east of Watts, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Maysville... Lake Francis... Fairmount... Ballard... Gallitin... Cherokee City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
